raw_comment: In this graph i have noticed that more men and women text there parents instead of visiting in person or calling. i wonder why people do not call there parents more than they text. this relates to my community because almost every one that can communicates with there parents every day. "ears eyes or mouth everyone communicates some how"
ace_sentences: In this graph, I noticed a trend.
More men text their parents than visit their parents in person.
More women text their parents than visit their parents in person.
More men text their parents than call their parents.
More women text their parents than call their parents.
I wonder why people do not call their parents more than they text their parents.
This trend relates to my community.
Almost everyone in my community can communicate with their parents every day.
A person communicates with ears or eyes or a mouth.
